periphyton_data.csv: Velthuis, M., L. N. de Senerpont Domis, T. Frenken, S. Stephan, G. Kazanjian, R. Aben, S. Hilt, S. Kosten, E. van Donk, and D. B. Van de Waal. 2017. Warming advances top-down control and reduces producer biomass in a freshwater plankton community. Ecosphere 8:e01651

column3: Coded variable (warm/control) describing the temperature treatment level of the mesocosm.
Date on which the samples were taken from the mesocosms
Abundance of wall periphyton in the experimental mesocosms, expressed in chlorophyll-a/ cm2
